projects.name: wanderer.moe
projects.description: Resource website for assets from Games with over 1 million users globally. Built using SvelteKit, TailwindCSS & Cloudflare Stack (Workers, Pages & R2), utilizes Workers & R2 for api and cdn with Pages for the website. i18n support implemented using crowdin.

projects.name: hsr-fps-unlocker
projects.description: Node.JS program that bypasses Honkai: Star Rail's 60 FPS Cap by modifying the registry values.

projects.name: hi3-fps-unlocker
projects.description: Node.JS program that modifies registry entries to allow for custom modification value of Honkai Impact 3rd FPS in and out of combat.

projects.name: qbit-rpc
projects.description: A simple, lightweight, and easy to use Discord Rich Presence for qBittorrent, made with Javascript and Node.JS. Shows statistics such current and overall download and upload speeds, with average ratios.

projects.name: dromzeh.dev
projects.description: My personal website, programmed with SvelteKit, TailwindCSS, and Cloudflare Pages. Includes a static blog done with MDSVeX and Tailwind Typography. Lanyard API integration for Discord RPC.

projects.name: vmt
projects.description: A Discord Voice Message Transcriber and Translator. Made with discord.py, using Google's SpeechRecognition and DeepL's Translation API.
Svelte open-source music player with offline support. Customizable interface with CSS & keyboard shortcuts. Includes audio visualization, smart playlists, and LAN sharing.

projects.name: roblox-filter-for-discord
projects.description: Discord bot programmed in discord.py that adds 'Roblox-style' moderation to a channel using webhooks to imitate user communication, using their avatar and username.
